title: Life Domain
content:
fe Domain Tips & Builds

Life Domain primarily focuses on healing and preventing death. It can also perform effectively in melee combat when built correctly. Notes, Tips, and other Trivia for the Life Domain subclass go here.

All Cleric Spells in Baldurs Gate 3

You can search by Name, Level, School and Casting Time. Just type into the search box what you are looking for.
